210166.「さあ あるべき場所へ 帰りなさい。: Now go back to where you belong.

210168.「……巻き込んでしまって すまないね。\n よく来てくれた <pc>。:
Sorry I dragged you into this. Thanks
for coming <pc>.

210169.「私たちは 祖父が生みだした\n 禁忌……進化の秘法を 葬り去るために\n ずっ:
We have been on a journey to bury the secret of the forbidden evolution created by my grandfather. We
collected every single jewel of the Maiden's Tamashii, the material for this. But my grandfather, who had
risen from the Hell, hunted me down, and I had no choice but to entrust the bracelet to you.

210170.「そして ついに 不思議の魔塔で\n 最後のひとつとなる 宝石を手に入れた。\n:
And finally, the last of the gems in the Mysterious Tower has been received, so we've come to the
promised land.

210171.「さて……やるべきことを やらなければ。 \n おうごんのうでわは 持ってきてく:
Now I have to do what I have to do.You
brought the Golden Bracelet. Can you
throw it in the lava?<yesno><break>

210172.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「それは とても危険:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>It is very dangerous. Please do me a
favor.<yesno><break>

210174.「これで ひとまずは 安心だ。\n お前を 誇りに思うよ。\n<br>\n「……:
I'm relieved for the time being. I'm proud of you. You look a little confused. We split up when you were
seven.

210175.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「お前を置いて 旅立:
I can't ask for forgiveness for those of us who left without you, but as a parent, I couldn't be happier to see
you grow up so much today.

210176.「私たちには まだ やるべきことがある。 \n 一緒には いられないが いつでも:
We still have work to do.I can't be with you, but I will always wish you and <&13_aaaaaaac> the best. I wasn't
going to give this to you, but now <&13_aaaaaaaad> I think you can trust me with it. Read it later.

210177.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「この場所で ついに:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>He finally caught up with me here.
Thank you so much for your help.

210178.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「その おうごんのう:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>The Golden Bracelet is a terrifying
magical tool that amplifies the power
of the secret of evolution.

210179.<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>「カルサドラの 聖な:
<attr><feel_sad_lv1><end_attr>The sacred lava of Calsadora is said
to destroy the power of evil.

210180.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「大きくなったわね:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>You've grown up <pc>. Really,
you've grown into a fine man.

210181.「エテーネの村のこと 聞いているわ。\n 故郷を あなたが 守ってくれるのなら\:
I heard about Ethene Village. I can't think of anything more reassuring than knowing that you will protect my
hometown.

210182.<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「あなたに カメさま:
<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>May Galapagod bless you. I love you
<&13_aaaaaaad>.

210183.<pc>は おうごんのうでわを\n溶岩に 投げ入れた！\n<br>\nアーヴもま:
<pc> threw Golden Bracelet
